char_info.desc: The Phantoms Who Leap Through Time

a0.speaker: Reimu:
a0.dialogue: Hold up... I have this deja vu feeling with this girl... Have we met before?

a1.speaker: Kagami:
a1.dialogue: Do you not remember me? The name's Kagami Ochiai - the phantom who leaps through time.

a2.speaker: Reimu:
a2.dialogue: Now I think I know why you never aged like me.

a3.speaker: Kagami:
a3.dialogue: I never aged because I traveled to a different time period.

a5.speaker: Yumi:
a5.dialogue: That shrine maiden attacked me early on!

a6.speaker: Reimu:
a6.dialogue: Oh. So both of you are sisters, then. Now tell me, why are you here?

a7.speaker: Kagami:
a7.dialogue: We are here to seek revenge... That mysterious concert is ousting us in terms of popularity.

a8.speaker: Yumi:
a8.dialogue: So, we will raid the concert... with our followers from Kozan!

a10.speaker: Kagami:
a10.dialogue: So, you are doubting our actions, huh? You must be a spy from that suspicious concert.

a11.speaker: Yumi:
a11.dialogue: Now, prepare to perish, the impostor who poses as a shrine maiden! This will be what you get for attacking me early on!
